item.title: Sports: Renovations for PS5, Xbox Series now available
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Previously released for PC.

The PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions of first-person renovation simulation game Sports: Renovations are now available at a launch discount price of $19.99, publisher Dear Villagers and developer Goat Gamez announced. The price will change to $24.99 after November 6.

Sports: Renovations first launched for PC via Steam on March 27. The PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions were originally scheduled to launch on the same date, but were delayed.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Restore the glory of sports in a relaxing renovator sim!

How do you save your beloved team’s court from being torn down by a real estate developer? You do what you do best—renovate dilapidated sports facilities to collect the money you need to help out.

Restore gyms, courts, pools and pitches to their former glory, upgrade your tools and expand your headquarters. Collect trophies and mementoes during your renovation missions and display them proudly in a special room for everyone to see.

Step Into the Story

Your hometown basketball court is in danger. The shining star of your youth where you watched fantastic matches played by your favourite team. It’s a place where many young talents started their careers. It’s a home of many fond memories, now covered in cobwebs and dust.

The court is deteriorating rapidly. A big developer is only waiting to get his grubby hands on the place, tear it down and build a new shopping mall instead. But you won’t accept that.

Do what you do best! Grab your tools, roll up your sleeves and breathe some life into other old sports facilities to earn money. See the spaces normally unavailable to normal visitors. Learn the inner workings of sports and listen to fascinating tales about their history.

And when you’ve earned enough, step up and renovate your hometown’s court.

Level Up

Collect trash, clean up the dirt from walls and floors, give the place a fresh coat of paint, fix broken fixtures, furnish and decorate the place.

Remember to take a photo before and after to prove how good a job you did! Use the money you earn to upgrade your equipment and expand your headquarters—each unlocked room comes with its own perks and advantages.

Achieve Perfection

Leave no corner undusted and no wall unpainted. Carefully design the area and arrange every room with its functionality in mind. You have all the time in the world so use it to polish your skills and plan out the space—some designs are better than others so be creative! Tinker with sports equipment and assemble the furniture to the best of your ability.

And remember: just have fun and be proud of your achievements!

Key Features

  • Play in two game modes! Thwart the plans of a developer who wants to tear down your beloved basketball club in Campaign mode. Later, replay levels to renovate old facilities in different styles in the Free Play mode.
  • Buy new tools and upgrade the equipment you already own.
  • Earn money for your renovation jobs and use it to expand your own base of operations—unlock additional perks and side missions.
  • Buy cosmetic items you can place around your office.
  • Trophy room where the player sees various memorabilia collected during renovation missions.

Watch a new trailer below.

Consoles Launch Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/sports-renovations-for-ps5-xbox-series-now-available

item.title: Neopets: Mega Mini Games Collection announced for PS5, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch

Due out on March 26, 2026.

Publisher Bolt Production International and developer No Gravity Games have announced Neopets: Mega Mini Games Collection for PlayStation 5, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch on March 26, 2026.

A physical “Treasure Pack” edition distributed by U&I Entertainment will be available for PlayStation 5 and Switch. It includes a copy of the game, all 25 mini games, the 26th “Starlight Symphony” digital game, a 27th hidden mini game, a sticker sheet, a set of art postcards, a full-color double-sided poster, a scratch card surprised, and a shiny foil collector’s bag.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Here is an overview of the collection, via Bolt Production International:

About

If you grew up playing Neopets classics like Meerca Chase II, or Turmac Roll, then prepare to relive your happiest browser-game days with a modern twist! Neopets were stealing hearts well before Roblox hit the big leagues, and now the beloved franchise, with over 150 million lifetime players, is making its long-awaited modern console debut!

This charming Neopets compilation brings together your favorite characters and mini-games in one playful, engaging package. Designed to delight longtime fans while welcoming new players, it combines polished gameplay, nostalgic touches, and accessible fun for everyone ready to explore Neopia.

The digital release brings something truly special with the addition of Starlight Symphony, an all-new 26th Neopets mini-game made in collaboration with the official Neopets team! It’s a fresh spin on classic Neopian fun.

Key Features

  • 25 Mini-Games in One Cozy Collection – Rediscover 25 beloved classics, now polished with smoother controls and visuals, plus Starlight Symphony, a brand-new 26th digital bonus mini-game, and a hidden 27th game in the physical edition for inquisitive players to unlock.
  • Explore Neopia with Story and Heart – Navigate a fully mapped Neopia in Story Mode, guided by Nyx, your Neopet companion and narrator, as you tackle challenges and uncover the world’s charming lore.
  • Play Together or Compete – Enjoy local co-op multiplayer and track your progress with in-game and global leaderboards via Neopass (Nintendo online approval pending).
  • Neopass Rewards and Sharing – Connect your Neopets.com account to earn cosmetics, currency, and exclusive digital items, and share your achievements with friends and the wider Neopian community.
  • Future-Ready Fun – Keep the adventure going with seasonal events, downloadable content support, and time-limited challenges, all powered through Neopass.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/neopets-mega-mini-games-collection-announced-for-ps5-switch-and-pc

item.title: Famitsu Sales: 10/13/25 – 10/19/25
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Pokemon Legends: Z-A debuts at 1.48 million retail copies sold.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for week of October 13, 2025 to October 19, 2025.

Pokemon Legends: Z-A was the highest selling new release of the week, opening at 872,552 sales on Switch and 612,905 sales on Switch 2 for an opening week total of 1,485,457 retail copies sold.

On the hardware side, Switch 2 sold 201,684 units, the Switch family sold 23,713 units, the PlayStation 5 family sold 12,085 units, the Xbox Series family sold 188 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 23 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [NSW] Pokemon Legends: Z-A (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) – 872,552 (New)
  2. [SW2] Pokemon Legends: Z-A – Nintendo Switch 2 Edition (The Pokemon Company, 10/16/25) – 612,905 (New)
  3. [SW2] Mario Kart World (Nintendo, 06/05/25) – 55,996 (1,931,393)
  4. [PS5] Ghost of Yotei (SIE, 10/02/25) – 18,930 (165,902)
  5. [NSW] Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 (Nintendo, 10/02/25) – 11,129 (79,477)
  6. [SW2] Donkey Kong Bananza (Nintendo, 07/17/25) – 9,785 (351,540)
  7. [PS5] Battlefield 6 (Electronic Arts, 10/10/25) – 7,967 (31,259)
  8. [NSW] Little Nightmares III (Bandai Namco, 10/10/25) – 5,315 (23,121)
  9. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 4,984 (4,028,096)
  10. [NSW] Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – The Hinokami Chronicles 2 (Aniplex, 08/01/25) – 4,064 (139,111)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on October 24.
